short_summary: Electrical upgradation for Madeira Park Small Craft Harbour
duration_in_months: There is no data to estimate the duration of the contract
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
===============

**Notification #**
----------------

* **English Title:** F1571-220960 DCU - Madeira Park Small Craft Harbour - Electrical Upgrades
* **French Title:** F1571-220960 DCU - Port pour petits bateaux de Madeira Park - Mises à niveau électriques

**Reference Information**
----------------------

* **Reference Number:** WS4164271490-Doc4230666116

**noticeType**
------------

* **Invitation to Qualify:** Invitation to qualify for the tender

**Key Information**
-----------------

* **Location:** Madeira Park Small Craft Harbour, 12967 Madeira Park Rd, Madeira Park, BC V0N 2H0
* **Scope of Work:** Electrical upgrades, including supply of equipment, labour and materials, as described in the contract documents.
* **Timeline:** The contract is expected to start on October 31, 2023, with no specified end date.

**Tender Requirements**
----------------------

* **Contract Type:** Electrical cable laying service, electric power line construction service, and electrical system services.
* **Method of Tender:** Competitive selective tendering
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest price
* **Canadian Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Name:** Allison, Rodnie
* **Email:** [rodnie.allison@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rodnie.allison@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17558052?extsite=MTc1NTgwNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
